elements.name: Student verifies the enrolled course details and progress against the database

The displayed course progress should be greater than 0 and less than 100 percent
The displayed course information for student "pelajar1@example.com" should match the database records

elements.name: Enroll in a course with an invalid enrollment key

steps.name: User navigates to the course list and selects the unenrolled course "PABPMetagama"
User enters an enrollment key "kunci_salah_123"
User clicks the enroll button
User should see an enrollment error message "Kode Pendaftaran yang Anda masukkan tidak valid. Silakan coba lagi!"

arguments.val: "Kode Pendaftaran yang Anda masukkan tidak valid. Silakan coba lagi!"

elements.name: View quiz history for an enrolled course with no quiz attempts

steps.name: User enters username "reci@example.com" and password "recipelajar"
User clicks on the login button
User is navigated to the dashboard page
User is on the Quiz History page
User clicks the detail button for the course "Komdatjar"
The Sub Quiz History page should display the title "Riwayat Hasil Kuis"
The subtitle for the course "Komdatjar" should be visible
The history for "Komdatjar" should show a message "Belum ada kuis yang diselesaikan."
User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"

elements.name: View quiz history for an enrolled course with some quiz attempts

User clicks the detail button for the course "Komdatjar"
The system should display a list of quizzes for "Komdatjar"
The quiz details displayed on the UI for student "sa@example.com" and course "Komdatjar" should match the database records
User has opened the browser
User has navigated to the login page of JTK Learn app "https://polban-space.cloudias79.com/jtk-learn/"

elements.name: Search for a specific quiz in the history

steps.name: User enters username "sa@example.com" and password "sapelajar"
User clicks on the login button
User is navigated to the dashboard page
User is on the Quiz History page
User clicks the detail button for the course "Komdatjar"
User searches for the quiz "Kuis Pengantar"
The system should display a filtered list containing "Kuis Pengantar"
The filtered quiz details for student "sa@example.com" should match the database records for course "Komdatjar" and search term "Kuis Pengantar"

name: My Course Functionality
description:
As a PELAJAR user
  I want to manage and view my course progress
  So that I can track my learning journey
